title: New Apple Pencil on the iPad Pro
description:
At last, Apple has made a stylus for their new giant iPad Pro. It seems to work beautifully. Here's the ad that describes it.

Read more: http://gizmodo.com/apple-pencil-the-stylus-steve-jobs-warned-us-about-1729605755

We come from the future.
